item.title: 也许 "贬低 "不是最好的说法
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 马拉维排除因外汇流入导致货币贬值的可能性
item.description: 马拉维中央银行排除了货币贬值的必要性，因为在选民选出新总统后，外汇流入增加，缓解了美元短缺的问题。【原文：Malawi’s central bank ruled out the need to devalue the currency because foreign-exchange inflows increased after voters elected a new president, easing a dollar shortage.】

item.title: BTG Pactual 提出收购要约后，Banco Pan 跳升幅度创 2020 年以来之最
item.description: 在 Banco BTG Pactual SA 宣布出价收购该金融机构尚未持有的剩余股份后，Banco Pan SA 的股价创下五年来最大涨幅。【原文：Banco Pan SA surged the most in five years after Banco BTG Pactual SA announced a bid to acquire the remaining shares that it doesn’t already own in the financial institution.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，全球贷款人面临非银行压力带来的资本冲击风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二警告说，如果对冲基金和另类资产管理公司等全球金融体系的其他部分出现裂痕，银行的资本可能会遭受 "重大 "打击。【原文：Banks could suffer a “significant” hit to their capital if cracks appear in other parts of the global financial system such as hedge funds and alternative asset managers, the International Monetary Fund warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织就稳定币市场的金融稳定风险发出警告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二警告说，价值 3050 亿美元的稳定币市场可能威胁传统借贷，阻碍货币政策，并引发对世界上一些最安全资产的挤兑。【原文：The $305 billion stablecoin market could threaten traditional lending, hamper monetary policy and trigger a run on some of the world’s safest assets, the International Monetary Fund warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，南非希望与亚洲开展更多贸易往来
item.description: 南非贸易部副部长祖科-戈德林皮（Zuko Godlimpi）表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税之后，南非必须拓宽贸易关系，寻求更加平衡的出口足迹，并提到了东南亚的机遇。【原文：South Africa must broaden its trade relations and seek a better-balanced export footprint in the wake of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, said Deputy Trade Minister Zuko Godlimpi, citing opportunities in southeast Asia.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼表示新的压力测试提案即将出台
item.description: 美联储的最高银行官员表示，她很快就打算公布压力测试的更多变化，华尔街的贷款人很可能会为此举欢呼雀跃。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s top bank cop said she soon intends to unveil additional changes to stress tests, a move that Wall Street lenders are likely to cheer.】

item.title: 中国报复引发贸易战，美国股市暴跌
item.description: 美国股市周二下跌，原因是中国政府与华盛顿的长期贸易争端升级，以及美国最大的银行公布了第三季度财报。【原文：US stocks fell on Tuesday as Beijing escalated a long-standing trade dispute with Washington and the nation’s biggest banks reported third-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 普拉特的 BlueCrest 同意向投资者赔付 1.01 亿美元
item.description: 迈克尔-普拉特（Michael Platt）的投资公司 BlueCrest Capital Management 将向投资者赔偿 1.01 亿美元，因为英国监管机构称该公司未能管理好内部投资基金的利益冲突。【原文：Michael Platt’s investment firm BlueCrest Capital Management will pay out $101 million to investors after UK regulators said it failed to manage conflicts of interest over an internal investment fund.】

item.title: 金属行业资深人士 Ives 认为今年铜价达到 12,000 美元指日可待
item.description: 金属行业最著名的交易商之一在铜价看涨预测的大合唱中加入了自己的声音，他预测铜价可能在今年年底前创下接近 12,000 美元的纪录。【原文：One of the metals industry’s best-known traders is adding his voice to a chorus of bullish copper forecasts, predicting that prices could hit records near $12,000 before the end of the year.】

item.title: 穆迪称南非改革缓慢将无法实现增长目标
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）认为，南非逐步推进的结构性改革正在为经济注入活力，但还不足以将经济增长率提高到政府设定的 3.5% 的目标。【原文：South Africa’s gradual structural reforms are breathing life into the economy, but aren’t sufficient to lift the growth rate to the government’s 3.5% target, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 贡渥集团首席执行官称石油市场供过于求的局面终将出现
item.description: 世界顶级能源交易商之一的老板说，投资者长期预期的石油市场过剩终于出现了迹象，这一事实可能会开始推动原油价格下跌。【原文：An oil market surplus that’s long been anticipated by investors is finally showing signs of emerging, a fact that may start to drive down crude prices, the boss of one of the world’s top energy traders said.】

item.title: 英格兰银行利率制定者认为英国硬着陆风险日益增加
item.description: 英国央行决策者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）周二表示，英国经济面临越来越大的硬着陆风险，并再次呼吁加快降息步伐。【原文：The British economy faces a growing risk of a hard-landing, Bank of England policymaker Alan Taylor said on Tuesday, reaffirming his calls to speed the pace of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 沃尔玛与 OpenAI 合作在 ChatGPT 上提供购物服务
item.description: 沃尔玛公司正在与 OpenAI 合作，让购物者能够在 ChatGPT 上浏览和购买其产品，这是该零售商在人工智能方面的最新举措。【原文：Walmart Inc. is teaming up with OpenAI to enable shoppers to browse and purchase its products on ChatGPT, the retailer’s latest push to incorporate artificial intelligence.】

item.title: TeraWulf 为纽约数据中心发行 32 亿美元垃圾债券
item.description: 人工智能债务热潮已经席卷垃圾债券市场。【原文：The artificial intelligence debt boom has come to the junk bond market.】

item.title: 随着 "RILAs "的蓬勃发展，股权融资和股息曲线受到扭曲影响
item.description: 美国股市的两个小而重要的角落正在出现扭曲，这再次表明华尔街对衍生产品的痴迷正在重塑投资格局。【原文：Distortions are emerging in two small but important corners of the US equity market, in a fresh demonstration of how Wall Street’s obsession with derivatives-powered products is reshaping the investment landscape.】

item.title: 欧盟官员东布罗夫斯基斯称中国在贸易问题上咄咄逼人
item.description: 欧盟经济委员瓦尔蒂斯-东布罗夫斯基斯（Valdis Dombrovskis）警告说，中国正在利用全球商业关系推进其议程。【原文：European Union Economy Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis warned that China is exploiting global commercial relationships to advance its agenda.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告受滚动冲击的世界经济前景暗淡
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）警告说，全球经济正显现出受到美国全面关税和保护主义影响的迹象—；尽管迄今为止，全球经济的表现要好于预期。【原文：The International Monetary Fund warned that the global economy is showing signs of strains from sweeping US tariffs and protectionism — even though it so far has held up better than expected.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称英国面临七国集团中最严重的通胀和生活水平下降
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织称，尽管受到关税的影响，但今明两年英国的通货膨胀率将高于其他任何主要发达经济体，超过美国。【原文：Inflation will be higher in the UK than any other major advanced economy both this year and next, surpassing the US despite the impact of tariffs, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 高盛以五部分交易拉开收益后债券销售序幕
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）公布了创纪录的第三季度收入报告，成为美国六大银行中第一家在本轮盈利周期中举债的银行。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is the first of the six biggest US banks to raise debt in the current earnings cycle after the lender reported record third-quarter revenue.】

item.title: 前贝莱德高管力图重振多策略 ETF 赌局
item.description: 两位前贝莱德高管正带头进军规模虽小但发展迅速的 12.5 万亿美元交易所交易基金行业：多策略产品。【原文：Two former BlackRock executives are spearheading a push into a small but fast-evolving corner of the $12.5 trillion exchange-traded fund industry: multi-strategy products.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑为中国投资强制转让技术
item.description: 欧盟正在考虑，如果中国公司想在当地开展业务，就必须向欧洲公司移交技术，这是为提高欧盟工业竞争力而采取的一项积极的新举措。【原文：The European Union is considering forcing Chinese firms to hand over technology to European companies if they want to operate locally, in an aggressive new push to make the bloc’s industry more competitive.】

item.title: BCE 将节省 11 亿美元，向西扩展互联网服务
item.description: BCE 公司计划节省 15 亿加元（11 亿美元）的成本，并扩大加拿大西部和美国的家庭互联网服务，以恢复其在过去一年中股价下跌 26% 后的增长。【原文：BCE Inc. plans to save C$1.5 billion ($1.1 billion) in costs and expand home internet services in western Canada and the US to restore growth after its share price fell by 26% over the past year.】

item.title: 在美国要求中国首席执行官下台后，荷兰查封了耐克斯佩里亚公司
item.description: 根据荷兰法院的一份文件，在美国警告 Nexperia 必须更换其中国首席执行官才能不被列入制裁名单后，荷兰政府查封了该公司。【原文：The Dutch government seized Nexperia following a US warning that the chipmaker would have to replace its Chinese chief executive officer to stay off the sanctions list, according to a Dutch court filing.】

item.title: AMD 称甲骨文致力于广泛使用新型人工智能芯片
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.）是英伟达公司在人工智能处理器领域最接近的竞争对手，该公司表示，甲骨文公司将在明年大批量部署其即将推出的 MI450 芯片。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc., Nvidia Corp.’s nearest rival in AI processors, said Oracle Corp. will deploy a large batch of its forthcoming MI450 chips next year.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统鲁托公布 310 亿美元基础设施投资计划
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）宣布，计划在未来十年内斥资约 310 亿美元用于大型基础设施项目，一改此前控制支出和公共债务的承诺。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto announced plans to spend about $31 billion over the next decade on large infrastructure projects, a U-turn on his previous pledge to rein in spending and public debt.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 支持的 Salic 将寻求完全控股 Olam 公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，国有沙特农业与畜牧业投资公司（Saudi Agricultural & Livestock Investment Co.【原文：State-owned Saudi Agricultural & Livestock Investment Co. plans to pursue a full ownership stake in the agribusiness unit of Singapore’s Olam Group Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法院裁决后，被撤销的瑞士信贷AT1债券价格上涨
item.description: 瑞士信贷附加一级债券于 2023 年全军覆没，在瑞士法院裁定寻求损害赔偿的投资者部分胜诉后，与该债券相关的索赔价格迅速上涨。【原文：Prices on claims tied to Credit Suisse Additional Tier 1 bonds, which were wiped out in 2023, have risen rapidly after a Swiss court gave a partial win to investors seeking damages.】
